meanings.definition: A substance that kills or prevents the growth of mildew.
meanings.sent1: I sprayed the mildewcide on the walls to stop the mold from spreading.
meanings.sent2: The mildewcide I bought from the store effectively removed the mold in the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The mildewcide worked like magic, making the mold disappear in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a powerful mildewcide against the doubts that tried to grow in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The mildewcide acted swiftly, eradicating the mold with precision.

meanings.definition: A product used to control mildew growth.
meanings.sent1: The new mildewcide on the market promises to keep your bathroom free from mold.
meanings.sent2: Using the mildewcide regularly helped maintain a mold-free environment in the house.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the mildewcide was like a superhero for her walls, fighting off mold villains.
meanings.sent4: The mildewcide was a shield, protecting the walls from the invasion of mold spores.
meanings.sent5: With the mildewcide in hand, she felt confident in keeping her home mold-free.

meanings.sent1: The mildewcide quickly became my go-to solution for getting rid of mold in the basement.
meanings.sent2: After applying the mildewcide, the mildew vanished without a trace.
meanings.sent3: The mildewcide seemed to have a secret mission to wipe out all mold in its path.
meanings.sent4: His words were a mildewcide to the doubts that had crept into her mind.
meanings.sent5: The mildewcide was like a superhero swooping in to save the day from the mold invasion.
